text: Iwo amene adati: “Ndithudi Mulungu adavomera lonjezo lathu loti tisakhulupirire mwa Mtumwi wina aliyense pokhapokha ngati iye atibweretsera nsembe yomwe idzawotchedwa ndi moto wochokera kumwamba.” Nena: “Ndithudi! Kudadza kwa inuAtumwi ena ine ndisanadze ndi zizindikiro zooneka ndi zina za zimene mwanenazi. Kodi ndi chifukwa chiyani mudawapha awa ngati zimene muli kunena ndi zoona?”
